maze.gui.mazeeditor
Class GappedTemplate

java.lang.Object
  maze.gui.mazeeditor.MazeTemplate
      maze.gui.mazeeditor.GappedTemplate

public class GappedTemplate
extends MazeTemplate

This class provides a corner shaped MazeTemplate that can be grown or shrunk by increasing the length of its sides.

Author:
Johnathan Smith
